chirp: Yes, I did. ♪ Chirp. That's what birds say!. !set chirp true @entry
who: I'm the bird around these parts. @entry
what: I fly from my nest to some bushes to find food. ♪ Chirp.
multijump: It's the multi-jump power-up that I got a while ago.
They said it was a flying ability, but it's not really.
But I don't care much. At least I don't have to flap my wings anymore. @entry
